author: Simon Difford
description: Spirituous and bittersweet with a cleansing citrusy bite and underlying cognac complexity, this cocktail is suited to both aperitif and after-dinner occasions.
name: Renaissance

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass
